template.name: RbInitGemFileTesting
template.value:
source 'https://rubygems.org' ruby "$a$.$x$.$y$" gem 'selenium-webdriver', '~> 3.142', '>= 3.142.3' gem 'webdrivers', '~> 4.1', '>= 4.1.1' gem 'rspec', '~> 3.8' gem 'rspec-benchmark', '~> 0.5.1' gem 'appium_lib', '~> 10.4' gem 'cucumber', '~> 3.1', '>= 3.1.2' gem 'capybara', '~> 3.26' gem 'airborne', '~> 0.3.4' gem 'httparty', '~> 0.17.0' gem 'coderay', '~> 1.1', '>= 1.1.2' gem 'pry' gem 'faker', '~> 2.4'
# Buscar que version son las actuales y establecer las versiones # https://rubygems.org/gems/selenium-webdriver # https://rubygems.org/gems/webdrivers # https://rubygems.org/gems/rspec # https://rubygems.org/gems/capybara # https://rubygems.org/gems/appium_lib # https://rubygems.org/gems/cucumber # https://rubygems.org/gems/httparty # https://rubygems.org/gems/coderay/versions/1.1.2 # https://github.com/faker-ruby/faker # https://rubygems.org/gems/rspec-benchmark
